parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The unix time stamp at the time of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access. Used to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple api and expires in 2 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and params. Any raw HEX to BASE32 encoded string.

parameters.name: sorting_group
parameters.description: Sorting Group of the TO. Available value: 1, 2 Default: 2

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Specifies the TO quantity, up to a maximum of 20 per request. If not specified, the default value is 1.
